name: Pet Pals City
description:
Pet Pals City is a fun multiplayer virtual pet game. Create your own pet, customize it and you're ready to go!

There's tons of features to enjoy in Pet Pals City including:

-Meet all kinds of people from all around the globe, make friends, play different multiplayer minigames together and exchange gifts!
-Dress up and pamper your pet with all the clothing options!
-Decorate your home and visit your friends'!
-Chat with other online players in-game!
-Try your luck at the Fishing Pond to see what you can get!
-Generate coins while you're sleeping, plant trees and harvest them once you wake up!
-Sell your fishes, fruits and all the extra items you have to get even MORE coins!
-More than 1000 collectible items for you to get!
-In-game events and parties!

And much more!

What are you waiting for? Join the fun now!

Check the game news at @petpalsgame
